Bhavcopy from NSE

Source: R/bhav.R
bhav.Rd

Bhavcopy from NSE

bhav(x)

Arguments

x

numeric date format

Value

Bhavcopy for the given date.

Details

Gets Bhavcopy from NSE for the given date.

Note

The date should be strictly numerical and mentioned in quotation mark.

See also

bhavprbhavtoday

Author

Nandan L. Patil tryanother609@gmail.com

Examples

report = bhav("01072021") # Download bhavcopy for 01 July 2021
head(report)

#>       SYMBOL SERIES     OPEN     HIGH      LOW    CLOSE     LAST PREVCLOSE
#> 1  20MICRONS     EQ    60.45    60.75    59.20    59.45    60.50     60.15
#> 2 21STCENMGM     EQ    23.05    23.05    23.00    23.05    23.05     22.60
#> 3  396GS2022     GS    81.38    81.38    81.38    81.38    81.38     77.51
#> 4 3IINFOTECH     BE    10.00    10.15     9.55     9.90     9.95      9.85
#> 5    3MINDIA     EQ 24360.00 24599.35 24250.00 24315.35 24350.00  24331.55
#> 6     3PLAND     EQ    12.90    13.40    12.30    12.95    13.05     12.95
